Tip of the Month

Unlock Your Justia Lawyer Rating Badge

When you get peer reviews for your Justia Lawyer Directory profile, you earn your Justia Lawyer Rating and unlock the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge. If you don’t have attorney-to-attorney peer reviews yet, your Justia Lawyer Directory profile includes a tool that helps you "Request Lawyer Reviews" by sending email invites. Then you can showcase your new badge on your profile and on your website!
Learn More

From the Desk of Justia

Justia Legal Resources: Bankruptcy Law Center

Bankruptcy can give a debtor a chance to put their finances back together, but navigating the process is not always straightforward. The Bankruptcy Law Center in the Justia Legal Guides covers some basic considerations to keep in mind.

Chris Skelton | May 21, 2024

Justia Legal Resources: Car Accidents Legal Center

In a matter of moments, a car crash can change a victim’s life forever. However, they may have important legal rights to assert. The Car Accidents Legal Center at Justia can help guide them through these challenging times.

Chris Skelton | May 7, 2024

Justia CLE & Webinars: How AI Impacts Small & Solo Firms

Artificial Intelligence (AI): the two words that just a few years ago seemed like a distant future, but are now slowly becoming a part of everyday life. However, even as people and businesses increasingly use AI for everyday use, there are still a lot of questions to be had. Stay ahead of the curve and learn about AI and its effect on your firm in this webinar!
